Name: Rum Ram
About the game: We could write lots of nice and carefully placed things about the lore and stuff. But come on, this game is all about PURE! FAST PACED MAYHEM! Destroy everyone in the name of RUM! These are the skills that will lead you to VICTORY! Our signature skill, the skill that started it all! After Ramming other ships we said, well..what kind of old-school ships don't have Cannon Balls!? Is someone tailing you? Give em your Mine as a present! They will LOVE IT! We know it was needed.. so we delivered! Now you can mock your enemies all you want even in game!
